casebody.data:
Thursday, February 19, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

97-568. Am. Assn. of Univ. Professors, Cent. State Univ. Chapter, v. Cent. State Univ.

Greene App. No. 96CA21. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal and cross-appeal from the Court of Appeals for Greene County. Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae, Ohio Education Association, to participate in oral argument currently scheduled for March 4, 1998,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to participate in oral argument be, and hereby is, granted, and the amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellee/cross-appellant.
